channel.title: How do i change spells text, to make the tele's say dif stuff
channel.description:
I wanna change the ancient spells to say sumthing different besides what they are. Only the Tele spells. Im guess you edit the case to make it tele you somewhere, correct?
thanks.

Its in texthandler.java if you have one.

item.title: How do i change spells text, to make the tele's say dif stuff
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

Try a different one.
It has to be in there somewhere.
There right below the normal magicks.
So if you want to try like, “Air Blast”.
Go ahead.
I’m aware and 100% positive it is in the server side, client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change spells text, to make the tele's say dif stuff
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

In client.java, search:

Ice Barrage

Keep searching that until you finally reach all the spells and the text.
If you want to edit the teleport areas, check the ::mypos of the spell and search the coordinates in the client.java.

Read full topic
